DOC.brief_title: Motor Sensory Deficits Following Partial Meniscectomy
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study determine difference corticospinal excitability central sensitization nociceptive pathway individual history arthroscopic partial meniscectomy compare healthy control . Our central hypothesis quadriceps weakness follow partial meniscectomy due high level corticospinal excitability central sensitization nociceptive pathway , modify therapeutic intervention .
DOC.criteria: Age 1565 Arthroscopic partial meniscectomy past 15 year History traumatic spine low extremity injury within last 6 month Previous adverse reaction electrical stimulation ( i.e . burn hypersensitivity ) Cardiac pacemaker Metal implant head Current pregnancy Neurological disorder History seizure Unable give consent understand procedure study
